hackathon-description-text: This is our first student run, MLH sanctioned hackathon! The PolyHacks team is proud to host this event for students who want to create and develop hacks. It is a 24 hour event where many students from around the state will be coming together to create some amazing hacks!
hackathon-eligibility: In order to be elidgable you must meet the following requirements:
hackathon-rules:
TL;DR. Be repectful. Harassment and abuse are never tolerated. If you are in a situation that makes you uncomfortable at an officially sanctioned MLH event, if the event itself is creating an unsafe or inappropriate environment, or if interacting with a MLH representative or event organizer makes you uncomfortable, please report it using the procedures included in 
 document.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This is the prize for the most ridiculous hack.
This is the prize for the best hardware hack.
These are the prizes for the top 3 best hacks.
MLH's prize for the best use of Amazon Web Services.
MLH's prize for best domain name.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4700 Research Way, Polk City, FL 33868, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Only hacks that are submitted on Devpost before the hackathon ends will be qualified for judging.
In order to be considered for best hardware or most ridiculous you must choose those categories when submitting your hacks.

hackathon-location-address: 4700 Research Way, Polk City, FL 33868, USA
